entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Grouped CollectionView currently reads out the first item prefaced with "GroupHeaderTemplate" on WinUI #9082
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Border does not occupy all the space in a grid cell #9081
  • Shell.FlyoutContent does not update with hot reload (most likely an SDK issue) #9080
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Platform code is not included in Maui class library project #9079
  • ScrollView layout not updating after dynamic change. #9078
  • Build errors on OS with case-sensitive filesystem (MacOSX) #9077
  • FlexLayout trigger Cycle GUI exception #9075
  • RightToLeft: left padding is treated as left, but left margin is treated as right #9074
  • ImageButton IsLoading Property Is Not Set #9073
  • InputTransparent property does not work on Android #9069
  • App Icon for iOS is not created when app icon is not a multiplier by 8 #9067
  • The name property of an element should not contain class names like 'Microsoft.*.*' or 'Windows.*.*' as these are not usually information. #9066
    6.0-sr5
  • Publish Unpackaged Apps Error(Project Reference MAUI Library ) #9064
  • SwipeView causes Shadows to be clipped #9062
  • Crash CollectionView EmptyView SelectionMode=Single on Android #9060
  • [Android] Canvas shadow didn't get applied for the drawn ellipse #9059
  • iOS Debugger Indicates App Has Terminated Immediately #9056

Closed

  • Accessibility Insights for windows - flyout items with shell are wrongly named #8174
    6.0-servicing
  • MAUI App Black out on iPhone device #8904
  • View is overflowing when view parent has padding. #6032
    6.0-servicing
  • MAUI Image not render in Android #8902
  • Changing app icon of .NET MAUI app, then invoking MediaPicker crashes the app #8901
    6.0-servicing
  • Unable to publish .NET MAUI app on Mac - Runtime Identifier error #8893
  • Building .NET MAUI Class Library fails #8897
  • Make CalendarDatePickerExtensions.ToDateFormat public for .NET 7 #8931
    .NET 7
  • CollectionView seems to reuse images when loading more on Android. #8920
  • NETSDK1032: The RuntimeIdentifier platform "ios-arm64" and the PlatformTarget "x64" must be compatible #9065

PullRequests

Created

  • Force DisableFastUpToDateCheck=false for MAUI repo build #9083
    do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fixes for case-sensitive filesystems #9076
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22373.2 to 7.0.0-preview1.22378.2 #9071
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.Build.Download from 0.11.2 to 0.11.3 #9070
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • Make CalendarDatePickerExtensions public #9038
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #9057
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • [Housekeeping] Added more Windows Device Tests (added around 900 tests) #8854
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Pin net6 branch #9051
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
